altername_name: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero Haneda
name: I Am An Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero Tokyo
overview: Let's challenge traffic control of the sky! On this “Tokyo” edition, the player can try both the old three- runway version and the new four-runway version of the airport. There are 16 stages that are very enjoyable. Also, there is a replay mode so that the player can watch his/her operation whenever.
